title: Theptida Pla Rah
overview: Mahasatzhan is a rich, spoiled guy whose father works as an official in a small provincial town where Baymon also lives. The hero wants to marry his sister's friend, whom he meets at a party. But his father sets him a condition: before the wedding, he should study the lifestyle of the Baymon family. Later, the girl's family and several other acquaintances find themselves involved in a land scam and lose their homes. To get the land back, Baimon and his girlfriend decide to go to Bangkok and study law. There the girl gets a job as a maid in the hero's house to earn extra money.
